mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO pay_merchant_settlement (set_mchId,set_settleDate,set_payDate,set_settleType,set_settleAmount,set_state,set_createTime,set_updateTime) SELECT * FROM (
SELECT #{mchId} as set_mchId, #{settleDate} as set_settleDate, #{payDate} as set_payDate, #{settleType} as set_settleType, #{settleAmount} as set_settleAmount, #{state} as set_state, #{createTime} as set_createTime, #{updateTime} as set_updateTime FROM DUAL
) A
mapper.update:
UPDATE pay_merchant_settlement
set_settleId = #{settleId},
set_mchId = #{mchId},
set_settleDate=#{settleDate},
set_payDate=#{payDate},
set_settleType=#{settleType},
set_settleAmount = #{settleAmount},
set_state=#{state},
set_createTime=#{createTime},
set_updateTime=#{updateTime}
WHERE set_settleId = #{settleId}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM pay_merchant_settlement WHERE set_settleId IN
#{settleId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from pay_merchant_settlement where set_settleId = #{settleId}
